content: Hi, does anyone know if the Logica Health sandbox supports subscriptions?

Sorry, my question was pretty poor. We are wanting to evaluate using subscriptions, in particular rest-hooks. We are using the logica health sandbox for testing ideas and haven't been able to get a subscription to work. Does the sandbox have the ability to call rest-hooks? The documentation suggests that it may have this ability.
I'm not sure if anyone responsible for that sandbox is subscribed here. You may want to check their support forum
